txt.en:
'Your mission has concluded, [placeholder], and I am pleased it has ended happily! Now that it has, I can confess to you something.

'The physical hurt of the wound I suffered outside Helm's Deep pained me greatly, even as it would in time be healed by Leafshade's ministrations. But one pain remained even afterward: the pain of loss, of not knowing what befell my friends. As my body recovered, my heart dwelled on the uncertainty of what might be happening even then to you, and to Gl√©owine, and to Horn, and to Nona.

'Now that Thorongil of Pinnath Gelin has been rescued from the Kindred of the Coins... will you take one last journey with me, [placeholder]?'
Corudan is by the Harbour Warden's tower.
Talk to Corudan at the Harbour Warden's tower

'In the space before your adventures continue, my friend, I would ask to take one more journey with you.'

<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>
Corudan has returned after months away, and he desires to catch up with lost friends.
Corudan is by the Harbour Warden's tower.
Talk to Corudan and go with him on one more journey
